SCTX:
begin CharGenDoorEnterCaptain

;this is the door that goes into see the captian
;it tells you to look in the barrel and get the ring

;safety check for all menus on

short done

if (done == 1)
	return
endif

if ( OnActivate == 1 )

	if ( player->GetItemCount, "ring_keley" < 1 )
		MessageBox "Check the barrel to your left, and get the ring inside." "Ok"
	else
		set done to 1
		Activate
	endif
	


endif

End
